title: Designing Mobile Game-Based Language Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and digital learning tool application experience
context.additional_context: Customized language learning game development and operation using mobile devices in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can apply advanced language expressions (e.g., proverbs, idioms, jargon) contextually with 80%+ accuracy via game-based tasks.
Learners can form self-directed learning habits by achieving 90%+ weekly mission completion rates.
Learners can improve peer evaluation and feedback skills by 75%+ through collaborative game activities.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
